description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ku0q","text":"This protocol describes how to generate a DNA library of AAV capsid variants diversified by insertion of a randomized sequence encoding 7 amino acids between AA588 and AA589 of AAV9.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: {"blocks":[{"key":"8t271","text":"Ravindra Kumar, S., Miles, T.F., Chen, X.et al.Multiplexed Cre-dependent selection yields systemic AAVs for targeting distinct brain cell types.Nat Methods17, 541–550 (2020). https://doi.org/10.1038/s41592-020-0799-7","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":41,"length":6},{"style":"italic","offset":144,"length":11},{"style":"bold","offset":155,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

related_materials.name: NEBuilder HiFi DNA Assembly Master Mix - 50 rxns

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bcvr6","text":"Design primers for the randomized insertion. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79rd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c4i6t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d94v0","text":"We use a randomized heptamer codon insertion ([NNK] x 7) based on the NNK saturation mutagenesis strategy. This uses degenerate primers containing mixed bases (Integrated DNA Technologies). N can be A, C, G or T; K can be G or T. This strategy yields combinations of all 20 amino acids at each position of the heptamer peptide using 33 codons, resulting in a theoretical library size of 1.28 billion amino acid combinations.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1icfu","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":3,"offset":192,"style":"italic"}],"key":"12n94","text":"To introduce genetic diversity to the Round 1 library, we use a reverse primer containing 21 degenerate nucleotides ([NNK] x 7) inserted between amino acids 588 and 589 (VP1 numbering) of the cap gene.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bcmu1","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"19fmb","text":"The forward primer contains a 20 bp 5' overhang near the XbaI restriction enzyme sequence.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"66fr","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7n1t4","text":"Reverse primers contain a 20 bp 5' overhang near the AgeI restriction enzyme sequence.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1qmqq","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3uhcu","text":"Our primer sequences:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"12m2i","text":"XF (forward): ACTCATCGACCAATACTTGTACTATCTCTCTAGAAC","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6pnli","text":"7xMNN-588i (reverse): GTATTCCTTGGTTTTGAACCCAACCGGTCTGCGCCTGTGCMNNMNNMNNMNNMNNMNNMNNTTGGGCACTCTGGTGGTTTGTG","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58log","text":"Generate the AAV capsid library fragments by PCR using the AAV9 cap gene as template with   and forward and reverse primers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":64,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":90,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"70qkt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7rnu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2s2u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dvpv1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"DCB0B7A0D7FD11EDB16233315E3EE501","id":773,"linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Q5 Hot Start High-Fidelity 2X Master Mix - 500 rxns","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"M0494L","stats":{"total_protocols":1},"url":"https://www.neb.com/M0494","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/2.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.neb.com/","name":"New England Biolabs"}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8d1hh","text":"To avoid PCR-induced biases resulting from point mutations, recombination, and template switching, limit PCR amplification to 10-15 cycles and scale up to get the required yield.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ekfkd","text":"Linearize the rAAV-ΔCap-in-cis-Lox plasmid by restriction digest with AgeI and XbaI","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qmlr","text":"Purify the 480 bp band with   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9lqse","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bpscm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"td5o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":0,"cas_number":"","entries":null,"guid":"937A8A60D7FE11EDB16233315E3EE501","id":3640,"linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Zymoclean™ Gel DNA Recovery Kit","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"D4001","url":"https://www.zymoresearch.com/dna/dna-clean-up/gel-dna-recovery/zymoclean-gel-dna-recovery-kit","vendor":{"id":44,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://www.zymoresearch.com/","name":"Zymo Research"}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5tpf6","text":"It is critical to avoid AAV contamination during this step by taking precautionary measures like using a clean gel-running box and freshly prepared 1× TAE buffer.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bbrku","text":"Transform 1 ng assembled library into   and check for colonies after overnight incubation at 37ºC on LB-agar plates containing carbenicillin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":true,"cas_number":"","guid":"201941A0DA4811EDB16233315E3EE501","id":959417,"linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"SURE 2 Supercompetent Cells","pubchem_id":"0","public":0,"rrid":"","sku":"200152","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"http://","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"http://www.agilent.com/home","name":"Agilent Technologies"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fe4e8","text":"Sequence the DNA library around the insertion site. A non-biased library should match the diversity of the NNK/NNM motif (N=25% each of A, T, G and C; K=50% each of G and T; M=50% each of A and C) with minor fluctuations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
